oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rear view of the stage, Army-Navy "E" Award presentation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rear view of the stage, Army-Navy "E" Award presentation at the B.F. Goodrich plant. Frank Adkins spoke at the program. The B.F. Goodrich plant in Clarksville was awarded the "E" Award a total of 5 times during World War II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps; Industrial sites
